duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide post-op care and communicate with patients regarding medications and pain management.
Collaborate with physicians, RNs, and medical staff to convey changing circumstances during patient recovery.
Inform and educate patients and their families on proper post-op care procedures.
Administer and manage the wellness program for patients, focused on physical and nutritional health.
Ensure compliance with BLS certification within 90 days of hire.

education_certification.credential: Associate Degree in Nursing, State of New Mexico or Compact State Nursing License, BLS certification within 90 days of hire
